headline: Show HN: Scholars.io – Read, annotate and comment on research papers together
description:
Hey HN!

This is a small tool that I (finally) got around to create. It's called Scholars.io.

https://scholars.io

It allows you to read research papers together with other colleagues. You can annotate and comment on the PDFs directly.

It's something that I always thought of building since my research years. Let me know what you guys think!
